bio: Zomboy is trying on a human’s zombie costume, an “immortal zombie.” As a half human, it’s high quality and well fitting!

soultimate.name: Choppa Lotta
soultimate.description: Hit foe with a barrage of hits for lots of damage.

skill.effect: Increases the power of Soultimate Moves by 50%.
skill.name: Heavy Hitter

name: Immortal Zomboy
